title: Builds
content:
Hunters to deal incredible damage every round, without expending any resources.

Baldur’s Gate 3 Build Guide: Cleric: Clerics choose their Domain during Character Creation and for this Build, I’m going to be showing you my Light Domain setup. The reason I chose Light Domain is that I wanted to make a Cleric that could deal good damage and still have some support Spells, and Light Domain does a decent job of this.
